physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Accountants; Accountants: Front L. to R. Steve Shutter, Bob [Robert] Hochstadt, Mike [Michael] Feinstein, [the rest of the names have been torn off]; Standing L. to R.: Jay Chapman, [two illegible names], Ben Krieger, [illegible] Schneider, Chairman.''

mods.abstract: Members of the Allied Jewish Federation Accountants Division pose together. Front row left to right Stephen Shutter, Robert Hochstadt, Michael Feinstein, and an unidentified man and standing in back row left to right Jay Chapman, two unidentified men, Ben Krieger, and Mr. Schneider - Chairman.''
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
